issues.message: Remove or refactor this statement; it has no side effects.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal 'ansible.module_utils.common.sys_info.get_distribution' 3 times.
Correct one of the identical sub-expressions on both sides of operator "==".
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal 'ansible.module_utils.distro.id' 18 times.
Remove or refactor this statement; it has no side effects.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal 'platform.system' 4 times.
Correct one of the identical sub-expressions on both sides of operator "<=".
Refactor this function to reduce its Cognitive Complexity from 86 to the 15 allowed.
Correct one of the identical sub-expressions on both sides of operator ">=".
Either remove or fill this block of code.
